name: sindome
response: Sin Dome is a free online text-based cyperpunk roleplaying game that has been online since nineteen ninety seven.  It can be played in a mud client, or in your browser.  Visit us on the web at w w w dot s i n d o m e dot o r g.  To continue, ask me to define a specific cyberpunk word, or ask me for a random cyberpunk word.
reprompt: You can ask me for help to hear a list of commands.
